name: Ela
greetingText: Long time no see! How are you doing?
wishText: I wish the sky keeps bending on its knees to fulfill your wishes!
text1: Can't believe it's your birthday again!!! :D
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I hope you're having a birthday full of love and warmth, at least more than last year! ðŸ˜¬
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again. Bye!
